Comment: Do what you can to not spend a dime on large corporations and entities. Support local to the best of your ability. Move your money away from not only from politically aligned corporations, but all of them.   I know this is not always possible, but all of us can make personal choices that will ultimately hurt these scumbags in their wallets.   I do not eat at chain restaurants ever, I do a lot of my grocery shopping at local ethnic stores, I cut off nearly all of my subscriptions, stopped all Amazon purchases, shop for clothes locally or second hand, any entertainment items I purchase are from mom and pop shops. My money goes back into my community.
